title: Colony sim Ascent of Ashes, by a former RimWorld mod team, will hit in November

title: Check out free retro-RPG Moonring, made by an industry vet and Fable designer in classic Ultima style
description: Dene Carter was a designer on Dungeon Keeper, Fable—and some real classics from the old days.

title: Try to remain calm but Factorio is adding elevated trains
description: My god, it's full of stars.

title: The PC game releases we're most excited about in October
description: After one of the best summers of PC gaming ever, the year refuses to slow down.

title: Just five years after launch, FPS hit Dusk's free 'HD' remaster is going to touch up 'every texture, every model, every asset'
description: Swapping out Quake vibes for Half-Life vibes.

title: Wordle today: Hint and answer for #834 Sunday, October 1
description: A hint to help you out and today's Wordle answer if you need it.

title: Darktide's new talent trees let you throw an 'Ogryn-sized' grenade with a blast radius of 16 meters

title: Get in the robot, kill some space angels, in this turn-based tactical mecha battler
description: Elements of base defense and deckbuilding make Arc Seed an interesting prospect.
